item.description: Most residential buildings in the Castro were constructed between the 1880s and 1910s. Dominant architectural styles: Victorian (Italianate, Queen Anne) Edwardian Housing stock is primarily:

The fl√¢neur’s path appears random but is guided by curiosity and attraction. This describes a middle path between structured exploration and pure chance‚Äîa mindful wandering that follows intuitive pulls while maintaining awareness.
i am delighted by humans above all. for my birthday i drew menus and made stickers and prepared matcha the night before.

from https://substack.com/home/post/p-150508914?selection=f1aa01b3-8db6-423d-96c8-5126ab9a847e#:~:text=A%20city%20you%20love%20will%20always%20love%20you%20back%3B%20it%20invites%20you%20to%20project%20whatever%20you%20like%20onto%20it In ‚Äò The Creative Writer and Daydreaming‚Äô, Freud argues that creative writing is a warped extension of childhood play.

item.title: '25 recruiting reflection
item.description: ![[Screenshot 2025-12-27 at 2.12.10 PM.png]] see: [[content/january 2025 career aspirations|january 2025 career aspirations]] the dots only connect looking backwards. looking at my list it’s so obvious that this is where i’d want to end up - at my old job my edge was working with openai on maintenance for compute, so it’s only natural to seek jobs on the other side.

item.title: '25 winter break plan
item.description: goal: use the 2 week downtime to upskill on fundamentals i’d otherwise not have time for Reading List Breakneck joan didion/virginia woolf Articles DFW on Tennis https://archive.

item.description: [[style]] formula: black/white/blue neutrals white shirt white bodysuit silver jewelry wide leg pants

item.title: 11-7-25 log
item.description: a month ago i would see no one during the work day and everyone afterwards. today i see everyone during the work day and no one afterwards.

item.title: 12-01 diary entry
item.description: i feel quite tired this week emotionally exhausted from corporate socializing and feeling out of place and not funny and not smart feeling a little tired of talking about new york and missing new york my writing feels insufficient and forced as if i had not written something good in a while it is cold in sf but not that cold.

item.title: 12-15 operational work thought dump
item.description: making it so when we get a cluster, everything we need already works. Carolina does a good job but there’s always¬†something¬†that we have to go back and forth to feature-flag properly getting actual momentum behind open questions.

item.title: 12-15 talk ken liu
item.description: how come u dont hate ai craft & devaluation of craft very tricky thing mechanization of craft either resist or elevate that craft criticism is self-subverting why do you even value their opinion when the motion picture they thought of their machine as a scientific achievement didnt realize this had ability to capture presence of actuality possibility of being other places not interested in having ai write novels, create movies - uses are stupid - no more interesting than pointing a motion camera at a stage and playing that back fundamentally interested in what we can tell with only ai equivalent of cinema much like how cinema was a diff medium than play ai is a new medium why are people upset about environmental impact we use this work for industrial farming use ai to craft dreamlike experience what are we not doing with dreamweavers ken liu’s - what forms of art are under threat vs new forms of art eg photography did destroy professions but not portrait drawings - its the drawings made by daughters engravers were put out of busines real disaplacement of human craft - why do we prefer heliograph art of engraver is particularly constrained highest ideal is recreating someone elses vision when you ask a machine to do a copy work - when the highest copy of the human ideal any art form where the highest ideal is judged by how well you can copy something graphic design - ur art is judged by how much client like what u do machine will always be doing faster / cheaper readers are not monolithic so long as primary interface is chat it will not reach full potential what is it like working w an artist - its like convo its just like talking about something to someone he enjoys reading the papers of interpretability research groups copies / consciousness the uploading process does not work because its just a copy of u a copy is inherently worthless - not as worth as the original how do you know that the same person who wakes up is the same as the person who went to sleep yesterday are yo ujust a separate mortal being - continuity is a mere illusion brain of theseus argument https://www.

item.title: 2025 reflection
item.description: [[‘25 recruiting reflection]] [[content/April 2025 reflection|April 2025 reflection]] [[content/March 2025 Reflection|March 2025 Reflection]] [[content/2.1.2025 run reflection|2.1.2025 run reflection]] momentum mori - this should be my 2025 piece - i did things bc i could - i hosted that photo gallery, reached out to that chef, organized regular writing clubs and made it a thing - and i was relentless about job search.

item.title: 2025 wrapped & reflection website
item.description: website “How was your 2025?” gallery of photos i want to do a fun photo animation Structure import basic csvs/digest from other platforms get some data visualizations - strava running vs spotify music csv beli roi of rating vs price partiful events photos friends events photo photo walk in coney island photo walk in central park photo walk w andrew photo walk in central park photo gallery photo scrapbooking event photo studio writing writing clubs - # writing cafe late night writing event other hinge event hot pot night (x2) dumpling (x2) substack posts articles written word cloud books i who have never known men the emperor of gladness breakneck sour hearts rental house the vegetarian still life with oysters and lemon the idea lab blockchain chicken farm a walkable city that weird japanese book a streetcar named desire steve jobs georgia review stones of sorrowlake martyr i drank a lot of coffee insert example movement flights running 9 nyrr races concerts Plan

Onboarded onto OpenAI! Log got IT equipment got 30/60/90 plan from Kenny started setting up notion document generally feeling excited to dive in but also nervy as hell i want to do well, formulate my own take on agi, and also understand and anticipate the fires that will happen figure out how to proactively communicate w kenny feeling fulfilled and almost overwhelmed by everything that is happening lots of adrenahline and i just want to work on something i want to write out some substack articles before my attention is completely split notes on awe?

x### Logs to make go work put https:// before all go links data streams Grafana data reading thru https://www.notion.so/openai/GPU-Fleet-Glossary-Definitions-1518e50b62b080d89d1eff2cf3f5d7e4 meet with

friday !! ideal note flow meetings tracked w gdocs meetings captured in notion/gdocs Goals for EoW Decom understand the upcoming clusters for decommissioning Prob will start with c202 https://docs.
** Consider other important metrics we should track and build dashboards for them Amount of time nodes spend in validation
Log i am feeling a little squishy these days today i worked on refactoring my notion - added a meetings / projects tasks ideal workflow in the morning:

Weekly goals: #1) Maintenance across providers Figure out the toil of automations across our CSPs Talk to hardware health members about each csp (eri/gene/vansh) Create document with plan Open questions:

always allocating up to sla - kinds of things that are happening released new health checks that took out a bunch of capacity turned on a health check a lot of borderline not getting to thinking with any regularity allocating up to 85% up to budget
maintain the block sequentially give them for maintenance for 4 hours networking updates compute node updates - gpu fw itself - oai is supposed to deply

![[Pasted image 20251030122906.png]] Coreweave Reno [Reno-H100] (Research cluster) fecc0bcd-91ed-4382-b336-c50ea37eb5fa Second one is the subscription by Avi GuptaAvi Gupta8:57 AMSecond one is the subscription CoreWeave Portland [PDX2] fecc0bcd-91ed-4… by Avi GuptaAvi Gupta8:57 AM
quantify how many gpus would actually be “cut” across the fleet (aka how many clusters are >85% and what %) - so the “haircut” feels less scary
Weekly to dos: SLA Meet Milestone 1 for Track researchers usage of flex compute Allow other researcher to use flex compute Determine cluster rollout plan Maintenance

Figure out to transfer ticket info Pencil in maintenance process for CW - PDX2 / c21 Come up w pilot cluster list Tmrw - Wed Coreweave worry is that clicking an 8 vm block gcloud reservation block will show over 8 vms incorrect blocks is mapping incorrectly

strategy for rpms our goal provide researchers with stable and predictable access to compute esp for long-running jobs quota assignments to reflect what is actually reliably available in a cluster over time the problem we want to solve: today clusters appear to have enough quota but the # of healthy nodes can vary from week to week teams have been allocated more quota than healthy gpus to back it silent failure modes visibility problesm for why they have quota but cant use it tooling implementation in the future we want to introduce a buffer-based quota policy tied to cluster healthy where zoku quota will automatically align to healthy node count when cluster has more healthy nodes than SLA buffer, excess capacity flows into flx pool this is not removing compute from teams since everything is divertede to flex explanation of the tools / knobs jos to explain flex compute the ask from rpms socialize the shift to stable backng capacity how to treat flex as real compute will start with clusters with healthy headroom to build confidence log

message Joel day 1 five in one cluster unless for single node maintenances - azure marks all nodes as ua for azure steady state maintenance is completely automated for multi-node (aka ib switch) we dont wanna ua 32 nodes when only 3 are broken if shallotpeat was launching to get internal names get ndb backend names here most of these are research clustesr more disruptive research automation is prety good - it wont ofr nodes if we’ll switch the nodes interacting w any launches scheduled on diff days late night pacific time for applied its better to do peak 10PM - 5AM when Europe is getting CRD updates for applied here 14 hrs wanna do crd update moving clusters stall indefinitely oldest gb200
Script for RPMs Quick intros - Kenny a nd I work closely to bringing up new capacity and keeping it healthy, Jos works on scheduling and how to make compute accessible to researchers.
Log random things sign up for benefits sign up for navan write about ~ object permanence ~ cup in two places life in two places two days tied together by a redeye oncall notes
2126 usually 2428 if we decouple initial velocity option 2 w a few switches upgrade 2 of the switches & monitor next week automations file name for crawler log

see if we can do 60 nodes per day 64 nodes h100 b200 split h100 and b200 Action investigate node -> switch data coreweave clusters for maintnenancw CW Denver Cluster CW Denver Test Cluster CW Las Vegas Cluster - c11c OCI San Jose c204 Cluster - c204
I’m hesitant about shrinking parent quota of is currently live – since all of Research conducted planning with a set of GPU expectations.

aws sync <10 % is fine this is the information i need given a cluster get the product the engine group quantity of gpus and % of gpus in this target cluster for this engine group fleet notifier lessen the burden on myself and hardware and end ser

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1OchtdzbCcJjD2uJrOGtBAeQbt4ZQHlBVci6VYDzHFBM/edit?gid=0#gid=0 AWS https://docs.google.com/document/d/1V5Q5T26CGD7TX2gq8Kv9gUH28tu-YAkjqWC-Ht8nyOA/edit?tab=t.0 overallocation discoverability of flex quota user awareness of flex coordinate OCI Update: UFM replacement #1 Maintenance 11/21/2025 @ 10AM - 2PM susu = phx11+phx61 boto = phx11+12 + a little bit of 27/28
move the gpu and the cpu pick the ones where the regions have enough cpu capacity cpu not as easy to kill and bring it up

item.title: 2025-11-26 writing ideas
item.description: substack reflection my persona is the ‚Äúthe thoughtful, hyper-perceptive narrator who connects dots others miss‚Äù -> orient myself more into the emotional rather than intellectualizing the emotionals i focus more on imagery and details rather than the story itself i think my thing is i dont cut enough in my writing
https://knaaptime.com/urban_analysis/

item.title: 2025-11-28 airplane thoughts
item.description: misc i should invest more money american apps become more single use whereas chinese apps are more marketplace/multiuse my writing lacks the analytical rigor of theory / global affairs that are the meat of a story i am not competitive but i am motivated by pride i am passive - i feel like a passrby and life happens to me - i feel strange about boicing my desires passive voice & asian hood i will brute force my way thru ux loops expect some sort of latency / lag / first-try failure when i click a button so if something doesnt work i click again instead of assuming something is fundamentally wrong how to choose discomfort eg buying clothes outside of your particular style (bringing N along and hating the choices but its the only way to bring my fashion froward) resistance to boring tasks engaging in convos you’re out of the loop in going to an ai safety conference and asking questions i want to learn more, but i fear coming off as stupid standardized education is actually great for the forced discipline nothing is more uncomfortable than taking math/physics against your will philosophical theme: how to commit burn the boats / no exit
good day today but i dropped my fuji
75% in spy 25% in nasdaq

item.title: apps x social dynamics
item.description: how has beli influenced consumerism find my friends influenced space and place google maps influenced our sense of time and movement / compass spotify influenced music venmo public feed chatgpt influenced search airdrop scanning a qr code instead of getting a paper menu what do you miss about old menus what do you miss w the scan some places completely cut out the middle and just make you order the interfaces by which we interact chilis ipad screen [[kalshi - prediction markets - robinhood]] chinese casinos -> card games -> poker -> gameification apps also credit card points hit here investing apps gameify exps as a kid no real stakes so reg apps help but as an adult making money is the game dscord servers Angle: Post-public-square internet; how governance, drama, and care work in small controlled spaces vs old open platforms.

item.title: breakneck dan wang
item.description: guizhao - datacenter center of china railroad system from shanghai <> beijing started at same time as sf <> la in 2008 finished in 2011, while la is still not until 2030 lawyer vs engineering state fengzhou - alibaba shanghai well-connected hangzhou - alibaba suzhou - manufacturing wetland parks around bike path economic growth rate 10% a year americans dont like infra projects rare environmental impact save for texas/arizona default in coastal cities is towards rigidity little eagerness for physical change manufacturing in china lot of influence from soviet union / manufacturing production vs consumption china is lightly taxxed on property taxes - moreso consumption tax welfare 10% on social spending compared to higher # s in US and europe esp on unemployment worrying that welfare cna make ppl lazy feels like chinese parents lmao central planning has resonance with china’s engineering state / construction and control leaders deng xiao ping huge differential in life outcomes for someone born in 1949 vs 1959 tik tok trends and cultural trends how fast is it?

item.title: combined
item.description: on seasons & becoming the winter darkness stings deeper in february, a bone-chill that clutches in lemmas of stillness. it’s lucky february’s a short month, giving way to march’s tentative warmth.

item.title: gpu orchestration masterbook - winter 25
item.description: Learning Plan Phase 0 - [[GPUs Fundamentals]] Topics GPU Components: SMs, HBM, interconnects Thermal vs power vs memory failures ECC errors (correctable vs uncorrectable) Why IB / NVLink issues masquerade as ‚ÄúGPU failures‚Äù -> what does healthy GPU really mean?

item.title: GPUs Fundamentals
item.description: What are the errors you can see Storage Primer Issues come in four ways: Persistent storage object storage (S3 / Blob) / network file systems (NFS / Lustre / GPFS ) / bloc storage (PD, EBS, local SSD) / node-local NVMe Data ingestion Check point downloads / datasets shards / containers images / model weights Runtime i / o mmap / read() / page cache / PCIe DMA / GPU memory copies GPU execution HBM / SRAM / Compute SRAM is the tiny whiteboard next to the compute - used for L1/L2 Caches no refresh however it has huge area cost on the chip HBM isued for model weights , kv cache, insane bandwidth its a big storage next to gpu many GPU utilization problems are actually memory hierarchy problems GPUs are uniquely sensitive to storage - CPUs tolerate slowness bc “CPU threads block / OS scheduler hides latency - you get slow, but it still works”.

item.title: hawaii trip post-mortem
item.description: i am extremely frustrated with how mich/esther handled this situation in terms of agreeing to go on this trip becoming wishy washy once it came to details and time to commit i booked ticket as forcing fucntion for ppl to commit instead ppl saw it as a constraint and decided to prioritize things over it michelle wouldnt give us a clear answer of whether or not she could go said she felt really bad about flaking but also felt bad about skipping out on the concert eventually gave us the reason that she doesnt know what to do in oahu and it was too expensive and she would be stressed which is so stupid bc oahu is the first place anyone goes to and also she’s going to a trip to taiwan so this logic doesnt make any sense esther also wouldnt give clear answer on whether she wanted to go said she would only go to maui any relationship requires you to commit true friendship requires you to commit it is not enough to be endlessly open -> you need to convert intent into action if you needlessly choose any friend over this group its a clear indication the group is not stable why do i struggle so hard to maintain these female friendships?

item.title: how to be bored
item.description: thesis: in stillness you train your ability to observe analysis - as someone who seeks novelty - nature is a necessary shock to my system - i often wonder how poets come from the most boring of places in middle america - to writing glorious pieces about the everyday - like ada limon and the plume of birds - mary oliver - industrious hummingbirds, egrets, motionless ponds, ‚Äúlean owls / hunkering with their lamp-eyes - ‚Äústands quite comfortably on the margins of things, on the line between earth and sky, the thin membrane that separates human from what we loosely call animal.

item.title: NVL
item.description: the problen NV had to solve: PCIE is too slow for GPU <> GPU traffic at scale multi-GPU workloads need high bandwidth low latency solution: build dedicated GPU-only interconnect point2point, packetized, cache-coherent link allows GPU A to read/write memory on GPU B without going thru CPU memory NVSwitch
